name: Herocide
description:
A Ludum dare 51 Compo entry

 A villian has found a laser that targets heros!

 you and your superhero team need to escape to saftey. Lucky for you guys, the laser only fires every 10 seconds.  

Each level you purchase and select a hero to play with.  when that hero is, inevitably killed by the death beam, spawn another hero

  make sure you are hitting the checkpoints to reach the end !

use the control stick to move/ W A S D to move

space/A to jump 

trigger buttons/ left shift to use your special abilites!

  to exit the game you will have to close the program

  made in unreal
